TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrincipalSearcher extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the methods and search patterns used to execute a query against the underlying principal store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O tamanho de página padrão de 256 KB é usado quando o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher> classe executa uma consulta para entidades de segurança de domínio. O aplicativo pode substituir o valor padrão, definindo o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A> propriedade subjacente <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> objeto que é retornado o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher%2A> método.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. The property must be set before the Principal searcher object can be used to perform a search.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. The property must be set before the Principal searcher object can be used to perform a search.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal queryFilter) cil managed

Docs.param: The object that specifies the filter to use for the search. The property is initialized to this value.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified query filter.
Docs.exception: Persisted principal objects can not be used as the . The parameter cannot be null or empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As PrincipalContext

Docs.summary: Gets that principal context that is used to perform the query. The context specifies the server or domain against which search operations are performed.
Docs.value: O objeto que especifica o servidor ou domínio no qual as operações são executadas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext> objeto contido nesta propriedade é obtido da propriedade de contexto do objeto principal definidas <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> propriedade. Consultas são executadas usando as credenciais especificadas no objeto de contexto principal e o contêiner especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext.Container*> propriedade. Para <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.Domain> e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.ApplicationDirectory> tipos de contexto, o contêiner é o nome diferenciado (DN) de um objeto de contêiner.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Disposes the current instance of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> FindAll() cil managed
Public Function FindAll () As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

Docs.summary: Returns a principal search result that contains a collection of all the principal objects that match the principal specified in the query filter property.
Docs.returns: A object that matches the query filter or an empty collection if no results are found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Os objetos principais retornados na correspondência de resultados de pesquisa principal o tipo de objeto contido no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> propriedade. A pesquisa é realizada no contexto especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A> propriedade. Para obter mais informações, consulte o tópico de visão geral de Consulta por Exemplo.

Docs.exception: The contains referential properties. For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic. The is a persisted principal.
A must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal FindOne() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a principal search result that contains the first principal object found that matches the principal specified in the property.
Docs.returns: A object that contains the principal object that matches the query filter or null if no results are found.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Se houver uma correspondência exata do objeto especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>, esse método retorna o objeto. Se houver várias correspondências do <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> do objeto, este método retorna um dos objetos de correspondência arbitrariamente.
O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> objeto retornado desse método corresponde ao tipo de objeto contido no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> propriedade. A pesquisa é realizada no contexto especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A> propriedade. Para obter mais informações, consulte o tópico de visão geral [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) (Consulta por Exemplo).

Docs.exception: The contains referential properties. For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic. The is a persisted principal.
A must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetUnderlyingSearcher() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the underlying search object that is used by the Account Management API to perform the search.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O aplicativo pode modificar as propriedades diretamente no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> objeto antes de executar a consulta. A consulta será executada em seguida, usando as propriedades modificadas. Por exemplo, o tamanho de página padrão de 256 KB é usado quando o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher> classe executa uma consulta para <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.Domain> entidades. O aplicativo pode substituir o valor padrão, definindo o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A> propriedade subjacente <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> objeto que é retornado deste método.

Docs.exception: A must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed. The contains referential properties. For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic. The is a persisted principal.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Type GetUnderlyingSearcherType() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the type of the object returned from the method.
Docs.returns: A that specifies the type of object returned from the method.
Docs.exception: A must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::Principal ^ QueryFilter { System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::Principal ^ get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::Principal ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the query filter that is used to locate matching principals.
Docs.value: O objeto que é usado para a consulta ou nulo se nenhum filtro for definido.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O objeto principal contido nessa propriedade pode ser qualquer tipo de objeto derivado da classe principal; computador, usuário ou grupo. O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> também pode ser um tipo de entidade estendido definido, estendendo o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal> ou <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>. O tipo do objeto de classe derivada que é passado para essa propriedade determina o tipo de objeto que é consultado. A consulta resultante contém um AND lógico de todas as propriedades definidas no objeto principal especificado. Para obter mais informações, consulte o tópico de visão geral de Consulta por Exemplo. Para obter mais informações sobre as classes estendidas, consulte o [Principal extensões](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) tópico de visão geral.

Docs.exception: Persisted Principal objects can not be used as the . The cannot be null or empty.
